content: if i already have a tactic mode proof of something, is it possible, just knowing its length and what theorems and tactics it calls, to use aesop or something similar to get a shorter one? how would one do it? no example, just wondering if its possible.
AFAIK, the only available options are (1) look at the proof and try to do it yourself, and (2) post it on Zulip and wait till someone golfs it for you.
